fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Wanderer: The first time you are attacked by someone, your goal changes to their goal. You must help your attacker win.
- Settler: Once you have received your goal, your hand size increases to 6.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Search: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Supplies: Draw 2 cards. If you do not use them this phase, they are wasted. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Inquire: Choose a player. Learn their faction. Influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Help the player that first attacked you win.
